title: Stereolife
text:
Stereolife is an <a href="English%20language">English language</a> hit in <a href="Norway">Norway</a> for the Norwegian band <a href="Donkeyboy">Donkeyboy</a>, their sixth single taken from their album "<a href="Caught%20in%20a%20Life">Caught in a Life</a>" after singles "<a href="Ambitions%20%28song%29">Ambitions</a>" and "<a href="Sometimes%20%28Donkeyboy%20song%29">Sometimes</a>" (both #1s for 13 and 8 weeks consecutively in the Norwegian Singles Chart), "<a href="Broke%20My%20Eyes">Broke My Eyes</a>" (that reached #6), "<a href="Awake%20%28Donkeyboy%20song%29">Awake</a>" (that reached #8) and "<a href="Blade%20Running">Blade Running</a>" (that reached #8).
"Stereolife" released in 2010 but not yet charted in the Norwegian Singles Chart.
